components.name: Titanium SDK
components.description: Any integration or issues with the TiSDK

fields.description:
We need to determine exactly how the Titanium CLI will impact Alloy.

* Will it support the existing compiler plugins or will new ones have to be written? Will we have to support 2 different plugins in order to be compatible back to 2.1?
* How will this impact the "run" command and the common/titanium.js implementation?
* Talk with Chris barber to determine if there are any other critical things we need to be aware of.

comments.body: Alloy is running with the new CLI on android, iOS, and mobileweb, using both the new CLI interface, as well as through the latest RC of TiStudio 3.0. Any further features or bugs will be logged in separate tickets.
